name: Sprint 4
description: This is a simple game, which has features to pain by using 3D Primitives. Users can choose 3D primitive shapes: sphere, multi cylinders, or cube. There are two types of animation and 3 types of shape. In addition to that, users  are able to mix color palette by switching sliders, users can change, size, random colors of primitives.  On the right side user can see a clock which shows the current time. A toggle allows users to stop destroying all the objects or put a timer to destroy  from 1 to 3 seconds. Also, users can destroy everything at once by pressing "Destroy All" button.
